billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Authorizes the town of Greenburgh or the village therein to adopt a local law to impose a 3% hotel/motel occupancy tax; allocates 1/3 of tax revenue to school district
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Greenburgh to adopt a local law to impose a hotel/motel occupancy tax for hotels not located in a village; authorizing villages in the town of Greenburgh to adopt a local law to impose a hotel/motel occupancy tax in such villages
